decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining artifact creatures like Thought Monitor and Emry, Lurker of the Loch with powerful artifact cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to establish an early advantage and maintain pressure throughout the game. Additionally, disruptive cards such as Pithing Needle and Metallic Rebuke help control the opponent's strategy while cards like Urza's Saga and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide additional card advantage and utility. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, resilient, and versatile in combat situations.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with cards like Street Wraith and Faithless Looting in order to bring out powerful creatures like Vengevine and Hollow One for free. By using cards like Burning Inquiry and Goblin Lore, you can also disrupt your opponent's hand while filling your own graveyard even faster. The aggressive nature of this deck allows you to quickly overwhelm your opponent with a flurry of powerful creatures, taking advantage of their early game plays.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Through the Breach. The deck also utilizes Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate additional value by copying these creatures. The deck aims to win the game quickly by overwhelming the opponent with massive threats from the graveyard, using cards like Devourer of Destiny and Yggdrasil, Rebirth Engine to support the reanimation strategy. Additionally, the deck includes control elements like Lightning Bolt and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This Jeskai Aggro deck focuses on combining fast, efficient creatures like Soul-Scar Mage, Monastery Swiftspear, and Dragon's Rage Channeler with powerful removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending to pressure opponents early and control the board. Cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help dig for needed cards, while Lava Dart provides additional reach. The addition of Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury offers a powerful finisher option, and the mana base allows for consistent casting of spells despite being three colors.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on early aggressive creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dragon's Rage Channeler to quickly pressure the opponent. Mishra's Bauble and Thoughtseize help disrupt the opponent's game plan while cards like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat provide removal and direct damage. Urza's Saga can generate value by tutoring for artifacts like Mishra's Bauble or Shadowspear. Wrenn and Six provide card advantage and help recur lands, while Nethergoyf adds another threat to the board. The deck also includes lands like Blood Crypt and Stomping Ground for mana fixing and Boseiju, Who Endures for extra spell protection.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with a combination of counter spells and removal, while also utilizing card advantage and card selection to maintain control of the game. It leverages powerful instant speed removal like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, along with efficient counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Snare. The deck also includes win conditions in the form of creatures like Marang River Regent and Thundertrap Trainer, supported by card draw and selection tools like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Preordain. The mana base is optimized for consistency and flexibility.

This deck aims to control the game by ramping up mana with UrzaTron lands and using powerful Eldrazi creatures to dominate the battlefield. It focuses on consistency and speed, utilizing cards like Expedition Map and Ancient Stirrings to search for necessary pieces. Glaring Fleshraker and World Breaker provide disruption for the opponent, while Kozilek, the Broken Reality and Sire of Seven Deaths offer powerful finishers. The deck's strength lies in its ability to quickly assemble its Tron lands and overwhelm the opponent with its Eldrazi threats.
